passives.name: Everlasting
passives.effects: {{tip|immobilize|Immobilizing}}, or {{tip|slow|slowing}} if you are {{tip|melee}}, an enemy champion grants a 100 {{as|(+ {{fd|4.5}}% '''current''' mana)}} {{tip|shield}} for 3 seconds (8 second cooldown). The shield's strength is increased{{ft|by 80%|to 180 {{as|(+ {{ap|4.5*1.8}}% '''current''' mana)}}}}if there is more than one enemy champion within {{tip|cr|icononly=true}} 1200 units.
